title: Home | Palmerston Chiropractic, Naturopathic & Massage Therapy
description: We are a fully integrated healthcare facility that offers a multi-faceted team based approach to your health care needs. At Palmerston Chiropractic, Naturopathic & Massage Therapy, your health is our number one priority!
cleaned_text: WELCOME TO PALMERSTON CHIROPRACTIC & NATUROPATHIC Palmerston Chiropractic & Naturopathic has been providing proactive, quality healthcare in a safe and comfortable environment since 1983. We are a fully integrated facility that offers a multi-faceted team-based approach to your healthcare needs. At Palmerston Chiropractic & Naturopathic your health is our number one priority! ABOUT US At Palmerston Chiropractic & Naturopathic we are committed to providing you and your loved ones with exceptional care in a compassionate and friendly atmosphere. Located in Palmerston, Ontario, our clinic is a multidisciplinary natural health care facility. We believe that our patients deserve the best individualized treatment, and we make an effort to make sure you always feel welcome and at ease. Whether you're coming in for one or more of our services, our dedicated team of health practitioners have the skills and resources to help you manage your health care needs. We can't wait to help you feel better today! OFFICE
